body_html: I have not aware of any virtualization technique that exposes NVLink to the hypervisor, and if the current KVM/Xen doesn't support NVLink up to the same level of their support to PCIe, I doubt if it's possible for us to use native NVLink interconnect on public cloud.
body_text: I have not aware of any virtualization technique that exposes NVLink to the hypervisor, and if the current KVM/Xen doesn't support NVLink up to the same level of their support to PCIe, I doubt if it's  possible for us to use native NVLink interconnect on public cloud.
body: I have not aware of any virtualization technique that exposes NVLink to the hypervisor, and if the current KVM/Xen doesn't support NVLink up to the same level of their support to PCIe, I doubt if it's  possible for us to use native NVLink interconnect on public cloud.
